title: Issues opening loading screen to enter game
body: Every time after champ select, before the loading screen opens, league crashes and I get a bugsplat. If I try to reconnect, bugsplat happens again. It keeps happening and I've tried closing and logging back in and redownloading, still no fix.

replies.body:
I looked into this and it seems that the biggest causes of Bugsplats going on right now are either caused by a new monitor being swapped out or the Windows Game Bar causing issues. I strongly recommend ensuring the Windows Game Bar has been completely disabled by following [**this guide.**](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html)

Please let me know if you didn't change monitors lately or if that Game Bar disable didn't resolve this for you.
